title: AO live blog: Second round begins in Melbourne
description: We've reached the second round at the 2025 Australian Open, and it's a busy day, with stars taking to the court wherever you look. Keep up with Day 4 in our live blog.
author: ESPN staff
excerpt: We've reached the second round at the 2025 Australian Open, and it's a busy day, with stars taking to the court wherever you look. Keep up with Day 4 in our live blog.
text: Taylor Fritz cruises into Aussie Open 2nd round with straight-sets win (0:38)Taylor Fritz defeats Jenson Brooksby in an all-American clash at the Australian Open. (0:38)ESPN staffJan 14, 2025, 06:20 PM ETWe've reached the second round at the 2025 Australian Open, and it's a busy day, with stars taking to the court wherever you look.Coco Gauff, Novak Djokovic, Carlos Alcaraz, and Aryna Sabalenka are among some of the top seeds in action.Stay tuned as we bring you all the live action, updates, and highlights from today's epic slate of matches.
html:
• ESPN staffJan 14, 2025, 06:20 PM ET

We've reached the second round at the 2025 Australian Open, and it's a busy day, with stars taking to the court wherever you look.

Coco Gauff, Novak Djokovic, Carlos Alcaraz, and Aryna Sabalenka are among some of the top seeds in action.

Stay tuned as we bring you all the live action, updates, and highlights from today's epic slate of matches.
